page.title: 18A CHILDRENS' WEEKEND
page.content: Samantha and Angela Luff's father is in the R.A.F. On a typical{Saturday,}after they had breakfast, they would go with their mother and father to do some shopping at Roy's of Wroxham about five miles away. This would take up most of the morning. During the afternoon they would watch T.V. or play out with their friends. Time after tea would be spent in playing games or again watching T.V. On the{Sunday,}in the morning they would go to Church and Sunday School. After lunch they would go out for a trip to some place of interest or to the seaside. The evening would again be spent playing with their friends or watching T.V.
